name: Skillveri Metaverse Workshop
summary: Skillveri Metaverse Workshop is a Virtual Reality simulation tool to train students on multiple vocational skills like welding (GMAW, SMAW, GTAW, FCAW), spray painting (decorative, automotive collision, automotive OEM, protective coatings), abrasive blasting, HVAC repair, etc.  Please note that you need a license to use this product. Request a trial license by clicking on "request for trial" button after launching the app. Approvals are manual and may take up to 48 hours.
